descriptionByte:
Scope:

This action aims at providing financial support for MS to carry out work linked to the modernisation of their public sector financial accounting systems under the accruals basis of accounting with a view to the eventual implementation of EPSAS.
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

This action aims at providing financial support for MS to carry out work linked to the modernisation of their public sector financial accounting systems under the accruals basis of accounting with a view to the eventual implementation of EPSAS.

"}
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action and topic, as these cannot be changed in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
1.   Eligible countries: described in section 6 of the Call document.

 

2.   Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in sections 5 and 6 of the Call document.
   

     Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template.

 

3.   Evaluation

      3.1 Evaluation criteria, scoring and threshold: described in sections 8 and 9 of the Call document.

      3.2 For submission and evaluation process, see the Guide for applicants.

4.   Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement: described in section 3 of the Call document.

 

5.   Proposal templates and model grant agreements (MGA):

 

Call for proposal: https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/other_eu_prog/esp/wp-call/esp-call-b2771-2018-epsas_en.pdf 

Multi-beneficiary Model Grant Agreement: https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/other_eu_prog/esp/mga/esp-mga-multi_en.pdf

Mono-beneficiary Model Grant Agreement:  https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/other_eu_prog/esp/mga/esp-mga-mono_en.pdf

Guide for applicants:  https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/other_eu_prog/esp/guide/esp-guide-applicants_en.pdf

Standard proposal template:  https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/other_eu_prog/esp/tpl/pt/esp-pt-b2771-2018-epsas_en.pdf

Declaration of unit costs:  https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/other_eu_prog/esp/tpl/pt/esp-declaration-unit-costs_en.pdf

 

Members of consortium are required to conclude a consortium agreement, in principle prior to the signature of the grant agreement.

6.   Additional documents:

      Annual Work Programme
title: European Public Sector Accounting Standards

results.summary: Modernisation of public sector accounting on an accruals basis in support of European Public Sector Accounting Standards
results.content: Modernisation of public sector accounting on an accruals basis in support of European Public Sector Accounting Standards

descriptionByte:
Scope:

This action aims at providing financial support for MS to carry out work linked to the preparation and development of European public sector accruals accounting (EPSAS).
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

 This action aims at providing financial support for MS to carry out work linked to the preparation and development of European public sector accruals accounting (EPSAS).

"}
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service, please click on the submission-button next to the type of action that corresponds to your proposal. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action and topic, as these cannot be changed in the submission system. Upon confirmation, you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Funding & Tenders Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.

October - November 2020

Starting date
